summary: This is a notice of docket activity from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein. It records the filing of a Notice of Appearance for additional counsel on behalf of the United States (Appellee) on August 5, 2019, and lists the attorneys and clerks to be notified.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Listed as an attorney to receive electronic notice of the court filing. Email address is partially redacted.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Listed as an attorney to receive electronic notice of the court filing. Email address is partially redacted.

persons.name: Donnell
persons.context: Identified as the Deputy Clerk for the Second Circuit Court of Appeals, associated with the docket activity.

events.title: Notice of Appearance Filed in Appellate Case
events.description: A Notice of Appearance for additional or substitute counsel was filed on behalf of the Appellee, the United States of America, in the appellate case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is a court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein.
It records the filing of a 'Notice of Appearance as Additional Counsel' for the United States (Appellee) on August 5, 2019.
Attorneys Martin G. Weinberg and Reid Weingarten are listed to receive electronic notice of this filing.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the appellate court following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and prior to his death.
